Verses: 1 karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
2 pidhaakkal Dhraatchakkaaigalaith Thindraargal, Pillaigalin Parkal Koosippoyina Ennum Pazhamozhiyai Neengal Isravel Dhesaththaik Kuriththuchchollugiradhu Enna?
3 ini Isravelil Indhap Pazhamozhiyai Solvadhu Illai Enbadhai En Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren Endru, Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar.
4 idho, Ellaa Aaththumaakkalum Ennudaiyavaigal; Thagappanin Aaththumaa Eppadiyo, Appadiye Maganin Aaththumaavum Ennudaiyadhu; Paavancheygira Aaththumaave Saagum.
5 oruvan Needhimaanaayirundhu, Nyaayaththaiyum Needhiyaiyum Seydhu,

6 malaigalinmel Saappidaamalum, Isravel Vamsaththaarin Naragalaana Vikkiragangalukku Neraagath Than Kangalai Eredukkaamalum, Than Ayalaanudaiya Manaiviyaith Theettuppaduththaamalum Dhoorasthreeyode Seraamalum,

7 oruvanaiyum Odukkaamalum, Kollaiyidaamalumirundhu, Kadan Vaanginavanukku Adaimaanaththaith Thirumbakkoduththu Than Appaththaip Pasiththavanukkup Pangittu, Vasthiramillaadhavanukku Vasthiram Tharippiththu,
8 vattikkuk Kodaamalum, Polisai Vaangaamalum, Aniyaayaththukkuth Than Kaiyai Vilakki, Manidharukkulla Vazhakkai Unmaiyaaith Theerththu,
9 en Kattalaigalinpadi Nadandhu, En Nyaayangalaik Kaikkondu, Unmaiyaayiruppaanaagil Avane Needhimaan; Avan Pizhaikkave Pizhaippaan Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
10 aanaalum Avanukku Oru Kumaaran Pirandhu, Avan Kallanum Raththanchindhugiravanum, Mercholliya Kadamaigalinpadi Nadavaamal,
11 ivaigalil Ondrukkoppaanadhai Seygiravanumaayirundhu, Malaigalinmel Saappittu, Than Ayalaanudaiya Manaiviyaith Theettuppaduththi,
12 sirumaiyum Elimaiyumaanavanai Odukki, Kollaikkaaranaayirundhu, Adaimaanaththaith Thirumbak Kodaamal, Naragalaana Vikkiragangalukku Neraaga Than Kangalai Ereduththu, Aruvaruppaanadhai Seydhu,
13 vattikkuk Koduththu, Polisaivaanginaal, Avan Pizhaippaano? Avan Pizhaippadhillai, Indha Ellaa Aruvaruppugalaiyum Seydhaane; Avan Saagavesaavaan; Avan Raththappazhi Avanmel Irukkum.
14 pinnum, Idho, Avanukku Oru Kumaaran Pirandhu, Avan Than Thagappanseydha Ellaap Paavangalaiyum Kandu, Thaan Avaigalinpadi Seyyaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaayirundhu,
15 malaigalinmel Saappidaamalum, Isravel Vamsaththaarin Naragalaana Vikkiragangalukku Neraagath Than Kangalai Eredukkaamalum, Than Ayalaanudaiya Manaiviyaith Theettuppaduththaamalum,
16 oruvanaiyum Odukkaamalum, Adaimaanaththai Vaiththukkondiraamalum, Kollaiyidaamalum, Than Appaththaip Pasiththavanukkup Pangittu, Vasthiramillaadhavanukku Vasthirandharippiththu,

17 sirumaiyaanavanukku Novundaakkaadhapadith Than Kaiyai Vilakki, Vattiyum Polisaiyum Vaangaamalirundhu Than Nyaayangalinpadi Seydhu, En Kattalaigalil Nadandhaal, Avan Than Thagappanudaiya Akkiramaththinimiththam Saagaamal Pizhaikkave Pizhaippaan.
18 avan Thagappanovendraal Kodumaiseydhu, Sagodharanaik Kollaiyittu, Thagaadhadhaith Than Janangalin Naduvile Seydhapadiyinaal, Idho, Avan Than Akkiramaththile Saavaan.

19 idheppadi, Kumaaran Thagappanudaiya Akkiramaththai Sumakkiradhillaiyaa Endru Neengal Kettaal, Kumaaran Nyaayaththaiyum Needhiyaiyum Seydhu, En Kattalaigalaik Kaikkondu, Avaigalinpadi Seydhadhinaal, Avan Pizhaikkave Pizhaippaan.

20 paavancheygira Aaththumaave Saagum; Kumaaran Thagappanudaiya Akkiramaththai Sumappadhumillai, Thagappan Raajaavinudaiya Akkiramaththai Sumappadhumillai; Needhimaanudaiya Needhi Avanmeldhaan Irukkum, Dhunmaarkkanudaiya Dhunmaarkkamum Avanmeldhaan Irukkum.
21 dhunmaarkkan Thaan Seydha Ellaap Paavangalaiyum Vittuth Thirumbi, En Kattalaigalaiyellaam Kaikkondu, Nyaayaththaiyum Needhiyaiyum Seyvaaneyaagil, Avan Pizhaikkave Pizhaippaan, Avan Saavadhillai.
22 avan Seydha Ellaa Meerudhalgalum Ninaikkappaduvadhillai; Avan Thaan Seydha Needhiyile Pizhaippaan.
23 dhunmaarkkan Saagiradhu Enakku Evvalavenum Piriyamo? Avan Than Vazhigalai Vittuth Thirumbip Pizhaippadhu Allavo Enakkup Piriyam Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.

24 needhimaan Than Needhiyaivittu Vilagi, Aneedhi Seydhu, Dhunmaarkkan Seygira Sagala Aruvaruppugalinpadiyum Seyvaaneyaagil, Avan Pizhaippaano? Avan Seydha Avanudaiya Ellaa Needhigalum Ninaikkappaduvadhillai; Avanseydha Than Dhrogaththileyum Avan Seydha Than Paavaththileyum Saavaan.
25 neengalo, Aandavarudaiya Vazhi Semmaiyaai Irukkavillai Engireergal; Isravel Vamsaththaare, Kelungal; En Vazhi Semmaiyaayiraadho? Ungal Vazhigal Allavo Semmaiyallaadhadhaayirukkiradhu.
26 needhimaan Than Needhiyaivittu Vilagi, Aneedhiseydhu Adhile Seththaal, Avan Seydha Than Aneedhiyinimiththam Avan Saavaan.
27 dhunmaarkkan Thaan Seydha Dhunmaarkkaththaivittu Vilagi, Nyaayaththaiyum Needhiyaiyum Seyvaaneyaagil, Avan Than Aaththumaavaip Pizhaikkappannuvaan.
28 avan Echcharippadaindhu, Avan Seydha Ellaa Meerudhalgalaiyum Vittuth Thirumbugirapadiyinaale Avan Pizhaikkave Pizhaippaan, Avan Saavadhillai.
29 isravel Vamsaththaaro: Aandavarudaiya Vazhi Semmaiyaai Irukkavillai Engiraargal; Isravel Vamsaththaare, En Vazhigal Semmaiyaayiraadho? Ungal Vazhigal Allavo Semmaiyallaadhadhaayirukkiradhu.

30 aagaiyaal Isravel Vamsaththaare, Naan Ungalil Avanavanai Avanavan Vazhigalukkuth Thakkadhaaga Nyaayantheerppen Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar; Neengal Mananthirumbungal, Ungaludaiya Ellaa Meerudhalgalaiyum Vittuth Thirumbungal; Appozhudhu Akkiramam Ungal Kettukkuk Kaaranamaayiruppadhillai.

31 neengal Dhrogampannina Ungaludaiya Ellaa Dhrogangalaiyum Ungalmel Iraadhapadikku Vilakki, Ungalukkup Pudhu Irudhayaththaiyum Pudhu Aaviyaiyum Undupannikkollungal; Isravel Vamsaththaare, Neengal En Saagavendum.
32 mananthirumbungal, Appozhudhu Pizhaippeergal; Saagiravanudaiya Saavai Naan Virumbugiradhillai Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
